MetaData.Name: RADx MARS
MetaData.OrgName: Datapult, an APHL company, in partnership with NIH NIBIB

Predicate.Description: If XCN.1 (ID Number) is valued

If XAD.3 (City) contains the value 'Fake City'.

If The first occurrence of ORC-12.1 (ID Number) is valued
If OBX-5 (Observation Value) is valued
If OBX-29 (Observation Type) is not valued
If ( OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) does not contain the value 'X'. AND ( OBX-2 (Value Type) contain the value 'NM'. OR OBX-2 (Value Type) contain the value 'SN'. ) )
If OBX-29 (Observation Type) does not contain the value 'QST' (Case Sensitive).

If OBX-29 (Observation Type) does not contain the value 'QST'.

If PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-29 (Observation Type) does not contain the value 'QST' (Case Sensitive).

Constraint.Description: The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD]]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
PID-1 (Set ID - PID) shall contain the value '1'.
If The first occurrence of PID-11.4 (State or Province) is valued then the first occurrence of PID-11.4 (State or Province) should match the regular expression '^[A-Z]{2}$'.
If The first occurrence of PID-10.1 (Identifier) is valued then the first occurrence of PID-10.3 (Name of Coding System) should contain the value 'HL70005'.
All occurrences of PID-11.5 (Zip or Postal Code) shall match the regular expression '^\d{5}$|^\d{5}-\d{4}$'.
If The first occurrence of PID-10.1 (Identifier) is valued then the first occurrence of PID-10.7 (Coding System Version ID) should contain the value '2.5.1'.
All occurrences of PID-3.4.3 (Universal ID Type) should contain the value 'ISO'.
All occurrences of PID-3.4.2 (Universal ID) should be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.

If All occurrences of PID-13.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) is valued then all occurrences of PID-13.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) should contain one of the values in the list: ['PH','Internet'].
All occurrences of PID-3.5 (Identifier Type Code) should contain the value 'PI'.
If The first occurrence of PID-5 (Patient Name) is not valued then the second occurrence of PID-5.7 (Name Type Code) should contain the value 'S'.
PID-7.1 (Time) should match the regular expression '^\d{8}$'.
MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'PHLabReport-NoAck'.
MSH-3.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.2 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'ELR251R1_Rcvr_Prof'.
MSH-4.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'CLIA'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.3 (Universal ID) shall contain the value '2.16.840.1.113883.9.11'.
MSH-5.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.4 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
MSH-5.2 (Universal ID) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['2.16.840.1.114222.4.3.15.2','2.16.840.1.114222.4.3.15.1'].
MSH-6.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
MSH-6.2 (Universal ID) shall contain the value '2.16.840.1.114222.4.1.217446'.
MSH-7.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
MSH-6.1 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'AIMS.PLATFORM'.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) shall contain the value '|'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) shall contain the value 'ORU'.
MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) shall contain the value 'R01'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) shall contain the value '^~\&'.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) shall contain the value 'ORU_R01'.
MSH-3.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
MSH-11.1 (Processing ID) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['P','T'].
MSH-4.2 (Universal ID) shall match the regular expression '^\d{2}[D|Z]{1}\d{7}$'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) shall contain the value '2.5.1'.
MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.
MSH-5.1 (Namespace ID) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['AIMS.INTEGRATION.STG','AIMS.INTEGRATION.PRD'].
OBR-22.1 (Time) should match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
OBR-7.1 (Time) should match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})?$'.
OBR-1 (Set ID - OBR) shall contain the value '1'.
OBR-4.1 (Identifier) should contain one of the values in the list: ['97097-0','94558-4','95409-9','94559-2','95209-3','96986-5'].
ORC-1 (Order Control) shall contain the value 'RE'.
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '94559-2'. then OBX-5 (Observation Value) should contain one of the values in the list: ['260385009','10828004','455371000124106','125157007'].
If OBX-19.1 (Time) is valued then OBX-19.1 (Time) should match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
OBX-15.1 (Identifier) should be identical to OBX-23.10 (Organization Identifier)
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '65222-2'. then ( OBX-2 (Value Type) should contain the value 'DT'. AND OBX-5 (Observation Value) should match the regular expression '^(\d{8})$'. )
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) does not contain one of the values in the list: ['35659-2','65222-2']. then OBX-2 (Value Type) shall contain the value 'CWE'.

If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '35659-2'. then ( ( OBX-6.1 (Identifier) should contain the value 'a'. AND OBX-6.2 (Text) should contain the value 'year'. ) AND ( OBX-6.7 (Coding System Version ID) should contain the value '2.1'. AND OBX-6.3 (Name of Coding System) should contain the value 'UCUM'. ) )
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '35659-2'. then OBX-2 (Value Type) should contain the value 'NM'.
OBX-15.1 (Identifier) should contain one of the values in the list: ['00Z0000042','00Z0000043','00Z0000015','00Z0000016'].
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '94559-2'. then OBX-5 (Observation Value) should contain one of the values in the list: ['260385009','10828004','455371000124106','125157007'].
If OBX-19.1 (Time) is valued then OBX-19.1 (Time) should match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
OBX-15.1 (Identifier) should be identical to OBX-23.10 (Organization Identifier)
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '65222-2'. then ( OBX-2 (Value Type) should contain the value 'DT'. AND OBX-5 (Observation Value) should match the regular expression '^(\d{8})$'. )
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) does not contain one of the values in the list: ['35659-2','65222-2']. then OBX-2 (Value Type) shall contain the value 'CWE'.

If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '35659-2'. then ( ( OBX-6.1 (Identifier) should contain the value 'a'. AND OBX-6.2 (Text) should contain the value 'year'. ) AND ( OBX-6.7 (Coding System Version ID) should contain the value '2.1'. AND OBX-6.3 (Name of Coding System) should contain the value 'UCUM'. ) )
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '35659-2'. then OBX-2 (Value Type) should contain the value 'NM'.
OBX-15.1 (Identifier) should contain one of the values in the list: ['00Z0000042','00Z0000043','00Z0000015','00Z0000016'].
If SFT-6.1 (Time) is valued then SFT-6.1 (Time) should match the regular expression '^\d{8}$'.
SPM-18.1 (Time) should match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
If SPM-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '119324002' (Case Insensitive). then SPM-4.2 (Text) should contain the value 'Specimen of unknown material (specimen)' (Case Insensitive).
SPM-17.1.1 (Time) should match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
If SPM-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '871810001' (Case Insensitive). then SPM-4.2 (Text) should contain the value 'Mid-turbinate nasal swab (specimen)' (Case Insensitive).
If SPM-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '697989009' (Case Insensitive). then SPM-4.2 (Text) should contain the value 'Anterior nares swab (specimen)' (Case Insensitive).
SPM-4.1 (Identifier) should contain one of the values in the list: ['697989009','871810001','119324002'].
PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-3.1 (Entity Identifier) shall be identical to PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-3.1 (Entity Identifier)

If PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contains one of the values in the list: ['35659-2','95419-8','65222-2'] (Case Sensitive). then PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-29 (Observation Type) should contain the value 'QST' (Case Sensitive).
PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-1 (Set ID - OBX) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000042'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-21.1 (Organization Name) should contain the value 'SA.OTCSelfReport'.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contains the value '00Z0000015' (Case Sensitive). then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.1 (ID Number) should match the regular expression '^\d{10}$'.
Where OBX-29 is not valued, OBX-17 (Observation Method) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurrences of OBX-17 (Observation Method) where OBX-29 is not valued in the message.
OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurances of OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) in the message.
Where OBX-29 is not valued, OBX-19 (Date/Time of the Analysis) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurrences of OBX-19 (Date/Time of the Analysis) where OBX-29 is not valued in the message.
All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.3 (Given Name) should be identical to All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-16.3 (Given Name)
OBX-23 (Performing Organization Name) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurances of OBX-23 (Performing Organization Name) in the message.
OBX-15 (Producer's Reference) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurances of OBX-15 (Producer's Reference) in the message.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000016'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-21.1 (Organization Name) should contain the value 'SA.Proctor'.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000043'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.3 (Given Name) should contain the value 'SA.OTCInstrument'.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000042'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.3 (Given Name) should contain the value 'SA.OTCSelfReport'.
OBX-24 (Performing Organization Address) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurances of OBX-24 (Performing Organization Address) in the message.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000016'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.3 (Given Name) should contain the value 'SA.Proctor'.
1 occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.SPECIMEN.SPM-17.1.1 (Time) should be identical to 1 occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-7.1 (Time)

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000043'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-21.1 (Organization Name) should contain the value 'SA.OTCInstrument'.
